5/ Sign up today to get access to the full OpenAtlas platform (https://t.co/VZzLfqCk2J) and see how we're helping clinical research teams design better decentralized clinical trials (DCTs). 

I love launch days! --> https://t.co/yqI7EKl5O6  ğŸš€âš¡ï¸

4/ A research database like this has never been available to the public before, & our hope is that by breaking down barriers to data access we can speed up the process of deploying wearable tech in DCTs.

In short, we want to help the world create better, HumanFirst trials. https://t.co/AcW1yAllUl

3/ @GoHumanFirst empowers clinical researchers & tech enthusiasts alike to evaluate best-fit sensors for whatever use cases they can dream up. (Tag a friend!)

Atlas host the most comprehensive database to make those evaluation decisions. https://t.co/53aVxy3hcj https://t.co/6uWLnJ55sP

2/ OpenAtlas is a *free* tier of the @GoHumanFirst Atlas platform that enables anyone in the world to compare & evaluate over 1,200 wearables, sensors, & software-based tools. 

We've opened up Atlas. Meaning, you can play with it today! https://t.co/rZUL2sSfdC

1/ As we enter the 3rd year of a pandemic, many clinical researchers still lack resources to design & deploy DCTs. 

The wearable landscape has soared ğŸš€ & finding actionable sensor data has been harder than ever.
 
Our solution? We're launching OpenAtlas https://t.co/VZzLfqCk2J
